Pre-Game Insights: Brazil enters Copa America 2024 with the second-best odds of taking home the trophy
Costa Rica is expected to take a cautious approach against a star-studded Brazil attack
Vini Jr. is set to emerge as the best player at the tournament
Others: The game is scheduled for June 24, 2024

The match will be broadcast on FS1
